required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of MRG002 in the Treatment of Patients With HER2-positive Unresectable Locally Advanced or Metastatic Breast Cancer.
clinical_study.official_title: A Study of MRG002 in the Treatment of Patients With HER2-positive Unresectable Locally Advanced or Metastatic Breast Cancer.

brief_summary.textblock: The objective of this study is to assess the safety, efficacy, pharmacokinetics, and immunogenicity of MRG002 in patients with HER2-positive unresectable locally advanced or metastatic breast cancer.

primary_outcome.measure: Objective Response Rate (ORR) by Independent Review Committee (IRC)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to study completion (up to12 months)
primary_outcome.description: ORR is defined as the proportion of subjects with complete response (CR) and partial response (PR) assessed by Independent Review Committee (IRC) according to RECIST v1.1.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to study completion (up to 12 months)
secondary_outcome.description: ORR is defined as the proportion of subjects with CR and PR assessed by investigator according to RECIST v1.1.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to study completion (up to 12 months)
secondary_outcome.description: DOR is defined as the duration from the initial recording of objective disease response to the first onset of tumor progression, or death of any cause.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to study completion (up to 12 months)
secondary_outcome.description: TTR is defined as the duration from the start of treatment to the first onset of CR or PR in tumor evaluation.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to study completion (up to 12 months)
secondary_outcome.description: DCR is defined as the proportion of subjects achieving CR, PR, and stable disease (SD) after treatment.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to study completion (up to 12 months)
secondary_outcome.description: PFS is defined as the duration from the start of treatment to the onset of tumor progression or death of any cause.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to study completion (up to 12 months)
secondary_outcome.description: OS is defined as the duration from the start of treatment to death of any cause.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to 30 days after the last dose of study treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Any reaction, side effect, or untoward event that occurs during the course of the clinical trial whether or not the event is considered related to the study drug.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to 30 days after the last dose of study treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Plot of drug concentration changing with time after drug administration.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to 30 days after the last dose of study treatment.
secondary_outcome.description: The proportion of patients with positive ADA immunogenicity results.

arm_group.description: MRG002 will be administrated via intravenous infusion of 2.6 mg/kg once on Day 1 of every 3 weeks (21-day cycle).

overall_official.affiliation: Fifth Medical Center of PLA General Hospital
The Fourth Hospital of Hebei Medical University

facility.name: Fifth Medical Center of PLA General Hospital
The Fourth hospital of Hebei Medical University
